0.1.name: wordpress/socibookcom-christmas-social-bookmarking-button
0.1.description: Put a social bookmarking Christmas Button on your blog by socibook.com. They are 3 buttons specialy designed from socibook.com, check out the screenshots to see them. Post your content to SociBook.com to get free traffic and grow your blog. The installation is easy, it takes up to 1-2 mins. You can view the screenshots here: Screenshot-1 Screenshot-2 Screenshot-3 Screenshot-4
